model.name: constant
model.title: Constant
model.description: To use a constant value in Camel expressions or predicates. Important: this is a fixed constant value that is only set once during starting up the route, do not use this if you want dynamic values during routing.
model.label: language,core

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

id.description: Sets the id of this node
